What are the symptoms of Charcot-Marie-Tooth disease type 2L ?,"What are the signs and symptoms of Charcot-Marie-Tooth disease type 2L? The Human Phenotype Ontology provides the following list of signs and symptoms for Charcot-Marie-Tooth disease type 2L. If the information is available, the table below includes how often the symptom is seen in people with this condition. You can use the MedlinePlus Medical Dictionary to look up the definitions
